meanings.definition: A physical feeling or perception resulting from something that happens to or comes into contact with the body.
meanings.sent1: The warm sun on my skin created pleasant sensations.
meanings.sent2: She felt a strange sensation in her fingertips after touching the icy metal.
meanings.sent3: The ticklish sensation of feathers on his nose made him giggle.
meanings.sent4: The sensation of floating on air filled her with joy.
meanings.sent5: The sharp sensation of a pinprick made him wince.

meanings.sent1: The sensation of excitement filled the room as the surprise was revealed.
meanings.sent2: He had a sensation that someone was watching him in the dark alley.
meanings.sent3: The sensation of hunger hit her as soon as she smelled the delicious food.
meanings.sent4: The sensation of peace washed over her as she listened to the calming music.
meanings.sent5: The sensation of pride swelled in his chest as he received the award.
